identifier: Psych Guys - Cognitive Bias Perception Memory and Decision Making
title: UnderstandingCognitiveBiasPerceptionMemoryandDecisionMaking
description: Exploring cognitive biases in psychology, focusing on their impact on perception, decision-making, and memory.
learningOutcomes: Understand group bias and its effects on perception.
Grasp the sunk cost fallacy in decision-making.
Learn about illusory correlations in generalization.
